alert.note: Alert for Preble (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 06 at 4:31PM EDT until June 06 at 5:00PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 500 PM EDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN WAYNE...NORTHEASTERN UNION COUNTIES IN EAST CENTRAL INDIANA AND NORTHERN PREBLE COUNTIES IN WEST CENTRAL OHIO... At 429 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles west of Eaton, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...A 60 mph wind gust was recorded at RID (Richmond) AWOS. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. Locations impacted include... Richmond, Eaton, Lewisburg, New Paris, Eldorado, West Manchester, Boston, Richmond Municipal Airport, Witts Station, Oklahoma, West Florence, Kitchel, Interstate 70 at US Route 127, Sugar Valley, Lake Lakengren and New Hope. This includes the following Interstates... I-70 in Indiana between mile markers 154 and 156. I-70 in Ohio between mile markers 0 and 13. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
